channel.title: Mudclient 140 @ imthenull
channel.description:
Any idea why its not letting me log in and throwing an ArrayIndexOutBoundsException?
[img]https://imageshack.us/scaled/large/834/screenshot20130505at103.png[/img]

item.title: Mudclient 140 @ imthenull
item.dc:creator: @No_Effn_Lime No Effn Lime
item.description:
@No_Effn_Lime wrote:

[quote=“imthenull, post:5, topic:518572”][quote author=No Effn Lime link=topic=636838.msg4293463#msg4293463 date=1367779514]

lol the version on bitbucket doesn’t have logging in, i haven’t commited to the repository in a few months. rep++ for showing interest though.

At that point, I was having trouble with updating. The issue lies withing the packet encoders/decoders, it’s fixed in my latest version. I should probably update the repo.

Okay thanks for replying. If you could update it on bitbucket, that would be great
[/quote]The update doesn’t have much more, you can just log in, and it shows your character (dressed in red). You can’t walk, do multiplayer, or anything fun really. I can update it if you really want me too.[/quote]

Oh, still pretty badass though to play on such an old jagex client. So I say yes to the update if you dont mind doing it

Read full topic
